Question: By the time this person retired, he and his brother held the record for most career home runs by a pair of siblings (768).
Hints: This person did his part by hitting .393 with three homers and seven RBI.
This person also knocked in the 2,000th run of his career and hit a home run in the first All-Star game played in Atlanta.
In 1958, this person hit .326, with 30 home runs and 95 RBIs.
